title: Is Travis Scott the greatest of the current rap game? - Quora

response.answer_text: Would not consider rap to be a game, rather an industry. An industry that will fluctuate with talent and technology. Those with true talent who can perform and keep it together will survive. The hype studio magic talentless goobers will die off. In regards to Scott he’s pretty hot right but it’s up to him and his team to keep us interested and entertained and that is something us general listeners cannot decide for him.
